home.subtitle: Nurturing minds, caring hearts ðŸ’™
home.description: Our AI-powered platform provides gentle, comprehensive cognitive assessments designed specifically for elderly users. We help detect early signs of dementia with care, compassion, and cutting-edge technology.
home.howWeCareDesc: Our platform is designed with love and care specifically for elderly users and their families.
home.cognitiveAssessmentsDesc: Gentle daily tasks that feel like friendly games, designed to monitor your cognitive health.
home.voiceAnalysisDesc: Simple voice recordings help us track patterns and changes in your speech over time.
home.smartInsightsDesc: Easy-to-understand reports that you can share with your loved ones and healthcare providers.
home.securePrivateDesc: Your health data is protected with enterprise-grade security and never shared without your consent.
home.scientificallyValidatedDesc: Our assessments are based on proven cognitive science research and medical guidelines.
home.familyCenteredDesc: Easily share results with family members and healthcare providers for comprehensive care.

cognitiveAssessments.title: Cognitive Assessments
cognitiveAssessments.subtitle: Gentle exercises to keep your mind sharp
cognitiveAssessments.description: These friendly activities help us understand how you're doing. Take your time and don't worry about getting everything perfect.
cognitiveAssessments.memoryGamesDesc: Remember sequences, patterns, and word lists in a gentle, game-like format.
cognitiveAssessments.focusExercisesDesc: Focus exercises that help measure concentration and attention span.
cognitiveAssessments.wordActivitiesDesc: Fun word-based activities to stimulate language and recall skills.
cognitiveAssessments.visualPuzzlesDesc: Visual puzzles and patterns to challenge your problem-solving skills.

voiceAnalysis.title: Voice Analysis
voiceAnalysis.subtitle: Let us listen to how you're feeling
voiceAnalysis.description: Simply speak into your device. We'll gently analyze patterns in your voice to better understand your cognitive health.
voiceAnalysis.recordingDurationDesc: Speak for 1-2 minutes for the best analysis results. You can talk about your day, describe a picture, or read a short paragraph.
voiceAnalysis.clearEnvironmentDesc: Find a quiet space and speak at your normal volume. Make sure your device's microphone is working properly.
voiceAnalysis.naturalSpeechDesc: Speak naturally and comfortably. There's no need to change your usual way of speaking.

dashboard.title: Smart Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your cognitive health overview - Live Updates
dashboard.alertStable: Your cognitive scores are stable this month. Keep up the great work!
dashboard.alertVoiceAnalysis: Time for your weekly voice analysis. It only takes a few minutes.

auth.createAccountSubtitle: Start your cognitive health journey today
auth.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy

common.pageNotFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
